weapons.name: Nova Flare
weapons.description: Lance Enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon gain Divine Attacks, Magical Attacks, Lethal Strike, and Devastating Charge (+1 Att).  One use only. May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. The wielder counts as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge.

weapons.name: Elu's Heartwood
weapons.description: Longbow Enchantment. This weapon gains Shots 3, Str as user +1, AP as user +1, and Magical Attacks.

weapons.name: Sliver of the Blazing Dawn
weapons.description: Spear Enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and Magical Attacks. Each successful to-hit roll with this weapon causes two hits instead of one.

armours.name: Gleaming Robe
armours.description: Light Armour Enchantment. Standard size Mages only. The wearer gains Aegis (3+) and its Armour is set to 1, which cannot be improved. If the wearer Miscasts and rolls Witchfire or Magical Inferno, the number of hits is halved (rounding up).

armours.name: Protection of Dorac
armours.description: Heavy Armour Enchantment. Models on foot only. The wearer gains +2 Armour and +2 Defensive Skill.

armours.name: Daemon's Bane
armours.description: Suit of Armour Enchantment. The wearer gains +2 Armour against Magical Attacks.

armours.name: Starmetal Alloy
armours.description: Shield Enchantment. The first time the bearer’s model suffers an unsaved Wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds, the number of Wounds suffered is halved (rounding fractions up).

artefacts.name: Book of Meladys
artefacts.description: Dominant. Once per Magic Phase, the bearer may reroll a single Magic Dice when making a casting roll, provided the spell was not Miscast. When rerolling a natural '1', the rerolled Magic Dice benefits from Fizzle (if the Casting Attempt fails) regardless of the rerolled value.

artefacts.name: Ring of the Pearl Throne
artefacts.description: Cannot be taken by Gigantic. After step 4 of the Round of Combat Sequence (after Issue and Accept Duels), choose a single piece of Special Equipment or a single Dwarven Rune on a model in base contact with the bearer. This piece of Special Equipment or the Dwarven Rune cannot be used for as long as its bearer remains in base contact with the bearer of the Ring of the Pearl Throne. Only a single piece of Special Equipment or a single Dwarven Rune can be affected at any time. In case the model has more than one instance of the chosen equipment, only one instance is affected.

artefacts.name: Amethyst Crystal
artefacts.description: Wizards only. Dispel rolls made by the bearer’s Army gain a +1 modifier.

artefacts.name: Glittering Lacquer
artefacts.description: Cavalry models only. The bearer gains Hard Target.

standards.name: Navigator's Banner
standards.description: R&F models in the bearer's unit gain Distracting in the first Round of Combat against attacks from enemies Engaged in the bearer’s unit’s Front Facing.

standards.name: Banner of Becalming
standards.description: In the opponent's Magic Phase, during Siphon the Veil before converting Veil Tokens into Magic Dice, remove one Veil Token from the opponent’s Veil Token pool and add one Veil Token to your Veil Token pool.

standards.name: War Banner of Ryma
standards.description: R&F models in a unit with one or more War Banners of Ryma gains Devastating Charge (+1 Str). Model parts with Harnessed are not affected. In addition, all infantry models in the unit gain Devastating Charge (+1 Adv).

specialrules.specialrule: Multiple Wounds  (2, against Large Beasts, Large Cavalry, Gigantic)
Multiple Wounds  (2, Large Beast, Large Cavalry, Gigantic)
Multiple Wounds  (2, against Large Beasts, Large Cavalry, Gigantic)
